title: 31. Improve Your Health, Posture + Longevity in the Treatment Room + Owning a Business With Pilates Studio Owner Cora Wo
description:
Hi Treatment Roomies! We talked with Cora Wo, the owner of Xcore Pilates studio in the Bay Area about her experience going from the tech world to full time pilates bad ass. We got her input on fitness in general, how to best start your own business, and health and wellness in this time of uncertainty around COVID-19. We know you will love her as much as we do!

Cora's instagram @xcorestudio

Cora's website www.xcorestudio.com

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
